name.baseName: Soil remediation ; In-situ remediation ; Phytoextraction remediation ; Engineering implementation ; Asphalt transportation
土壤修复;原位修复;植物提取修复;工程实施;沥青运输

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 该数据集描述了在工业背景下应用植物提取技术进行原位土壤修复的应用。具体而言，该过程适用于被重金属（包括铅（Pb）、砷（As）和铊（Tl））污染的区域，在工程实施项目中的应用范围。此外，它涉及挖掘沥青的运输，强调其在处理废弃工业区污染中的使用。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The site taken as a reference for the remediation is an area of 712 m2 located in a disused industrial district of Tuscany (Italy), in the past subjected to various productive activities that led to contamination with various metals, some of which potentially toxic such as lead (Pb), arsenic (As) and thallium (Tl). As it is a “site of national interest”, its exact location is considered confidential and cannot be disclosed.

technology.technologicalApplicability: The process data set describes the application of phytoextraction techniques for in-situ soil remediation in an industrial context. Specifically, this process is to be applied to areas contaminated with heavy metals, including lead (Pb), arsenic (As), and thallium (Tl), within the scope of engineering implementation projects. Additionally, it involves the transportation of excavated asphalt, underscoring its use in addressing contamination in disused industrial areas.
该数据集描述了在工业背景下应用植物提取技术进行原位土壤修复的应用。具体而言，该过程适用于被重金属（包括铅（Pb）、砷（As）和铊（Tl））污染的区域，在工程实施项目中的应用范围。此外，它涉及挖掘沥青的运输，强调其在处理废弃工业区污染中的使用。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Vocciante, M., De Folly D’Auris, A., Franchi, E., Petruzzelli, G. & Ferro, S. CO2 footprint analysis of consolidated and innovative technologies in remediation activities. J Clean Prod 297, 126723 (2021).

Vocciante, M., De Folly D’Auris, A., Franchi, E., Petruzzelli, G. & Ferro, S. CO2 footprint analysis of consolidated and innovative technologies in remediation activities. J Clean Prod 297, 126723 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set, users should note that the reference site's location is confidential and should not attempt to disclose or infer its exact position. This LCA data is specific to the defined square footage and the particular contaminants mentioned, so extrapolation to other sites or contaminants requires careful consideration of the local context and contaminant profile. Ensure that any application of this data is appropriate for the scale and nature of the contamination being addressed. Special attention should be paid to the methodological consistency of the remediation process, including the appropriateness of phytoextraction for the specific contaminants and the logistic implications of asphalt transportation in this context.
使用此数据集时，用户应注意参考场地的位置是保密的，不应尝试披露或推断其确切位置。该LCA数据特定于定义的平方英尺和提到的特定污染物，因此对其他场地或污染物的推断需要仔细考虑当地情况和污染物概况。确保此数据的应用适用于正处理的污染的规模和性质。应特别注意修复过程的方法论一致性，包括植物提取对特定污染物的适用性和在此背景下沥青运输的物流影响。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
